TopicTitle: My SAS is still trying to kill me

Articles.Content: At the start and from 0:10 onwards you can see violent twitches on the role axis.And yes, i have version 0.21.1.

It is because of those large canards on a relatively small and light craft. It is harder for the new SAS to judge how large a correction needs to be made, as it doesnt know how much torque will be applied from the surfaces.
Plus the higher the speed, the more effect the canards have, and the roll is the most sensitive axis.
plus I am pretty sure that the center of lift is in front of the center of mass.
